Instruction: Combine coconut flakes and panko breadcrumbs in a shallow dish.
Beat egg in a separate shallow dish.
Spread flour on a third shallow dish.
Season tilapia fillets with salt and pepper.
Dredge tilapia fillets in flour, then egg, and finally coconut mixture.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook tilapia fillets for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through.
Alternatively, place tilapia fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until cooked through.
